original_text: And this is love, that we walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, That, as ye have heard from the beginning, ye should walk in it.
korean_text: 또 사랑은 이것이니 우리가 그 계명을 따라 행하는 것이요 계명은 이것이니 너희가 처음부터 들은 바와 같이 그 가운데서 행하라 하심이라

sentences.original_text: that we walk after his commandments
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 그의 계명을 따라 행하는 것입니다

sentences.original_text: That, as ye have heard from beginning
